com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier.policies

Interface Policy

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContextAwarePolicy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CalendarBasedVerificationPolicy, ContextAwarePolicyAdapter, DefaultVerificationPolicy, InternalVerificationPolicy, KeyBasedVerificationPolicy, PublicationsFileBasedVerificationPolicy, UserProvidedPublicationBasedVerificationPolicy

    public interface Policy
    Policy contains the set of rules to be used to verify KSI signature. Different type of policies can be used to verify KSI signature.
    See Also:
    InternalVerificationPolicy, KeyBasedVerificationPolicy, CalendarBasedVerificationPolicy, PublicationsFileBasedVerificationPolicy, UserProvidedPublicationBasedVerificationPolicy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Policy getFallbackPolicy()
      Used to get the fallback policy set by setFallbackPolicy(Policy).
      String getName()
      Human readable name of the policy
      List<Rule> getRules()
      Used to get the rules of the policy.
      String getType()
      This method returns the type of the policy.
      void setFallbackPolicy(Policy policy)
      Adds fallback policy to be used when signature does not verify with given policy.

    • Method Detail

      • getRules

        List<Rule> getRules()
        Used to get the rules of the policy. The rules are used to verify KSI signature.
        Returns:
        list of rules to be used to verify KSI signature

      • getName

        String getName()
        Human readable name of the policy
        Returns:
        the name of the policy

      • getType

        String getType()
        This method returns the type of the policy.

      • setFallbackPolicy

        void setFallbackPolicy(Policy policy)
        Adds fallback policy to be used when signature does not verify with given policy.
        Parameters:
        policy - fallback policy to be used when signature does not verify with given policy.

      • getFallbackPolicy

        Policy getFallbackPolicy()
        Used to get the fallback policy set by setFallbackPolicy(Policy).
        Returns:
        instance of Policy if fallback policy is set.
